person.bio: Honored to be part of a team that has the potential to make the world a better place by connecting billions of people to a new, accessible, data sovereign and environmentally conscious internet. A social entrepreneur, plant based warrior and a sovereign digital economy advocate with a passion for music creation and collaboration. Adnan has been based in the United Arab Emirates for the past 20 years, during which he has built successful grass-root businesses and invested startups in various sectors. At ThreeFold Adnan is responsible for driving the ThreeFold Foundation Ecosystem. Adnan is also the CEO of the @Mazraa Cooperative which is a founding farm and P2P Cloud Capacity provider on the ThreeFold Network.
person.excerpt: Honored to be part of a team that has the potential to make the world a better place..

node.title: The need for a sustainable digital currency

node.title: ThreeFold Foundation
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Foundation along with its partners is growing the ThreeFold Grid and a new peer-to-peer internet.
